column5: How is the aviailability for leechs around North Bay such as Billy Bob's or elsewhere.  I am heading through there next Wednesday.  Brian
Bob's on Trout lake road has some awesome leeches right now.  Discount, Billy Bob's, and North Bay Outfitter's should all have leeches this time of year.
WORMS are still working on the walleye.
bobs (green store) on trout lake rd. talked to him today
Walleye hit on worms all weekend. (even yellow Mr. Twisters).
Just use gulp leeches. Work just ask good IMO and don't get bitten off as easy. Live bait for the most part is a mental thing. Lol
short 25 minute drive to the village if nipissing,Bowmans Live bait had plenty ,22 bucks for a half pound,about 8-9 dozen I got out of it.
